featured.text: Many people found the story of the Kiddie Stool inspiring because it showed that with imagination, anyone can be an inventor.
The inventors of traffic lights in history.
The name most frequently 34 the paperclip invention is Johan Vaaler, a Norwegian inventor.
The inspiration came from the inventor’s wartime experience.
Later, as steel wire became more common, inventors began to notice its elastic feature.

definition.zh_def: 發明者；創造新事物的人。
definition.en_def: A person who creates or designs something that has not existed before.
definition.example: Thomas Edison is a famous inventor known for the electric light bulb.
